credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Elevation and Plan of Wash Basin and Mirror in Carrara Marble
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and yellow, gray and blue wash, graphite on wove paper
description: Elevation and plan of a washstand with mirror.  On either side are two pedestals each with a ceramic vase and an amphora sitting on top.
name: Drawing
